item.title: htmlpy框架学习
item.description: Notes for htmlpy Installation Platform: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS 1) Installing python package manager: pip sudo apt-get install python-pip 2) Installing htmlPy pip install htmlPy 3) Installing PySide sudo apt-get install python-pyside 4) Installing jinja2, which is depended by htmlPy. sudo pip install jinja2 5) Installing PyQt4 sudo apt-get install python-qt4 A simple demo Assume that there is a file named “index.html” in the same path.
